content.p: The Future Food Beacon is supporting our talented group leaders and technologists to realise their research ambitions by investing in new technology platforms. Our platforms foster innovation and enhance the research power of the Future Food Beacon and the University as a whole. Find out how we are supporting plant phenotyping research. A high-throughput elemental phenotyping facility Increasing sequencing capacity at Nottingham The Ancient & Environmental DNA Laboratory Explore more of what the Molecular Phenomics Platform has to offer.
